trans-unit.source: Represents a clause in a structured exception-handling block.
trans-unit.target: 表示结构化异常处理块中的子句。

trans-unit.source: The ExceptionHandlingClause class provides information about the clauses in a `try`…`catch`…`finally`
trans-unit.target: ExceptionHandlingClause 类提供有关中的子句信息`try`...`catch`…`finally`

trans-unit.source: To get a list of exception-handling clauses in a method, obtain a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents the method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取方法中的异常处理子句的列表，请获取<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示的方法。</xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetMethodBody%2A> method to obtain a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBody> object, and then use the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBody.ExceptionHandlingClauses%2A> property to get the list of clauses.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetMethodBody%2A>方法来获取<xref:System.Reflection.MethodBody>对象，，然后使用<xref:System.Reflection.MethodBody.ExceptionHandlingClauses%2A>属性以获取子句的列表。</xref:System.Reflection.MethodBody.ExceptionHandlingClauses%2A> </xref:System.Reflection.MethodBody> </xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetMethodBody%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 使用异常处理子句需要对元数据和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令格式的全面了解。

trans-unit.source: Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set".
trans-unit.target: 公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是"第 ii 部分︰ 元数据定义和语义"和"第三部分︰ CIL 指令集"中找不到的信息。

trans-unit.source: The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.
trans-unit.target: 联机; 我们提供了文档请参阅[ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)MSDN 上和[标准 ecma-335-公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) Ecma International 网站上。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClause"></xref> class.
This constructor is invoked by derived classes during the construction of <xref:System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClause> objects.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数由派生类调用的构造过程<xref:System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClause>对象。</xref:System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClause>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of exception handled by this clause.
trans-unit.target: 获取由此子句处理的异常的类型。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]1> 使用异常处理子句需要对元数据和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令格式的全面了解。

trans-unit.source: Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set".
trans-unit.target: 公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是"第 ii 部分︰ 元数据定义和语义"和"第三部分︰ CIL 指令集"中找不到的信息。

trans-unit.source: The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.
trans-unit.target: 联机; 我们提供了文档请参阅[ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)MSDN 上和[标准 ecma-335-公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) Ecma International 网站上。
